title: Pythagorean Theorem
description: Describes the relationship between the sides of a right triangle.

title: Euler's Identity
description: Connects five fundamental mathematical constants: e, i, Ï€, 1, and 0.

title: The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus
description: Links differentiation and integration, two core operations in calculus.

title: The Quadratic Formula
description: Provides the solutions to any quadratic equation.

title: Maxwell's Equations (in Differential Form)
description: Describes how electric and magnetic fields interact.

title: The Normal Distribution (Gaussian Function)
description: Represents the probability density function of the normal distribution.

title: The Wave Equation
description: Describes how waves propagate through space and time.

title: Bayes' Theorem
description: A formula for calculating conditional probabilities.

title: Fourier Transform
description: Transforms a function of time into a function of frequency.

title: Eigenvalue Equation
description: Defines eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a matrix.
